items.sentence: I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t know it was a secret.
I\'m planning to move back to Boston next year.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom has done this before.
I\'ll write Tom a letter as soon as I get home.
I\'m afraid I spilled coffee on the tablecloth.
Don\'t believe everything you hear on the news.
Don\'t blame yourself for what happened to Tom.
I don\'t know the reason why she isn\'t coming.
Thirteen people were killed in the train wreck.
Tom was fast asleep when Mary entered the room.
I think that Mary is more beautiful than Alice.
Tom is a lot better at doing that than Mary is.
Tom is about to get married for the third time.
Tom is actually on his way to Boston right now.
Tom is almost always free in the early evening.
Tom is always complaining about what Mary does.
I forwarded the message I got from Tom to Mary.
I always stay at their house when I\'m in town.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t really angry at him.
Tom knows that Mary doesn\'t know how to drive.
I don\'t want to tell Tom I\'ve been to Boston.
You were dying, but the doctor saved your life.
You were friends with both Tom and Mary, right?
He was looking forward to that evening\'s date.
I didn\'t tell Tom that I grew up in Australia.
I didn\'t think Tom would ask Mary to help him.
I don\'t really want anything to eat right now.
I promise I\'ll mop the floor tomorrow morning.
I promise you I won\'t do anything to harm you.
I wasn\'t aware that Tom hadn\'t yet done that.
This is the nicest present I\'ve ever received.
Tom always keeps Mary\'s picture in his wallet.
Tom didn\'t have any idea how long he\'d slept.
If you ask me, Tom is the one with the problem.
Country roads aren\'t as crowded as city roads.
Tom told Mary that she should take an umbrella.
Tom told Mary the story that John had told him.
Tom told Mary why it was a bad idea to do that.
Tom told me I was the one he wanted to talk to.
Don\'t throw it away just because it\'s broken.
Don\'t worry. I\'ve done this a thousand times.
I\'m an eighth-grade science teacher in Boston.
I\'m asking you to do this because I trust you.
Why don\'t you just find another place to live?
Why don\'t you just go away and leave me alone?
It won\'t be long before we can travel to Mars.
Tom could only understand a little French then.
Tom hasn\'t taken a bath since three weeks ago.
It wasn\'t Tom\'s first time to hear Mary sing.
It wasn\'t just me who didn\'t like that movie.
